params._token: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

params._tokens: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

returns.pending: BIOS reward for a given user.

returns.pool: Returns the pool that was updated.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

addPool(address,uint256).notice: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

deposit(address,uint256,address).notice: Deposit LP tokens to MC for BIOS allocation. MUST be called before UserPositions is updated!

harvest(address,address).notice: Harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

massUpdatePools(address[]).notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

pendingBios(address,address).notice: View function to see pending BIOS on frontend.

pid(address).notice: token address mapping to pool index

rewardDebt(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.

setBiosPerBlock(uint256).notice: Set the number of bios per block

setPool(address,uint256).notice: Update the given pool's BIOS allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

updatePool(address).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.IMPORTANT! If being called as part of a UserPositions update, it must be called before UserPositions state has been updated!

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraw LP tokens from MC. MUST be called before UserPositions is updated!
